name: Apple
description: Crisp, sweet-tart fruit - high in fiber and vitamin C

name: Banana
description: Sweet, soft tropical fruit - excellent source of potassium

name: Orange
description: Juicy citrus fruit - packed with vitamin C and antioxidants

name: Strawberries
description: Bright red berries - low in calories, high in vitamin C

name: Blueberries
description: Small dark berries - packed with antioxidants and phytoflavinoids

name: Avocado
description: Creamy, fatty fruit - rich in healthy monounsaturated fats

name: Pineapple
description: Sweet tropical fruit - contains enzyme bromelain that aids digestion

name: Watermelon
description: Refreshing summer fruit - 92% water content, hydrating and low calorie

name: Grapes
description: Small, sweet berries - contain resveratrol and other antioxidants

name: Mango
description: Sweet tropical fruit - rich in vitamins A and C
